title: Branding font - any suggestions?
content:
I am working on a logo for a client, and they want a look of a branded piece of wood - meaning that there company name would be burned (branded) into the wood, like on a wood barrel.   
   
Any suggestions of good fonts for this?   
   
Thanks in advance!

 [‹ Designing a typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20071120062256/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6319 "Go to previous forum topic") [Where to study typography in Germany??? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071120062256/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6334 "Go to next forum topic")
author: luckypp
